ti:translation.ti:label: Pro Tullio
ti:translation.ti:description: For Marcus Tullius, The orations of Marcus Tullius Cicero Vol 2 Three orations on the Agrarian law, the four against Catiline, the orations for Rabirius, Murena, Sulla, Archias, Flaccus, Scaurus, etc. Cicero, Marcus Tullius, creator; Yonge, Charles Duke, 1812-1891, translator

ti:edition.ti:label: For Marcus Tullius
ti:edition.ti:description: Orationes Volume VI. Cicero, Marcus Tullius, creator; Clark, Albert Curtis, 1859-1937, editor
